About Me

I am a results-driven Software Engineer specializing in AI/ML systems and full-stack development. I am curently a senior computer science student at the University of Michigan. This past summer, I worked as a Software Engineering Intern at Filsinger Energy Partners, where I architected and deployed production-level applications that delivered significant client impact and business value.
